newsitem.title: USA: BOJ governor says no inflation fear now in Japan.
newsitem.headline: BOJ governor says no inflation fear now in Japan.

text.p: Bank of Japan (BOJ) Governor Yasuo Matsushita said on Sunday that there is no fear of inflation in Japan at the moment.
However, he told Reuters that the BOJ is monitoring movement of prices in Japan carefully because there is a possiblity that upward pressure on prices may increase if the economy becomes stronger.
"At the moment, there is fear of inflation, but we are keeping close watch on price develoments because prices may go up when the economy becomes stronger," he said.
